Title: Relates to parking regulations
Summary: Provides for a distinctive placard for licensed physicians, visiting nurses, nurses, physical therapists and chiropractors to permit parking in parking prohibited zones for a period of up to one hour while attending to a patient in the immediate vicinity.
LawCode: Amd ยง1203, add ยง404-ff, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to parking regulations
